name: Polda 2 remástr
storyline: In his second adventure Pankrác investigates various mysterious events connected to the city of Marsias. The city is known for its a state-of-art DNA technology thanks to which the city has been prospering since putting the technology into practise. There are many doubles of famous people and artists in Marsias which the original versions of the famous people and artists use for some shady business. When Pankrác steps in to the city, the city prepares for crowning its new Cloned Miss of Beauty.
summary: A remastered version of 1999´s classic czech point and click adventure Polda 2.
